{{cpp/numeric/random/discrete_distribution/title | probabilities}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/discrete_distribution/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|1=
std::vector&lt;double&gt; probabilities() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Obtains a {{c|std::vector&lt;double&gt;}} containing the individual probabilities of each integer that is generated by this distribution.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
An object of type {{c|std::vector&lt;double&gt;}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;random&gt;
#include &lt;vector&gt;

int main()
{
    std::discrete_distribution&lt;&gt; d({40, 10, 10, 40});
    std::vector&lt;double&gt; p = d.probabilities();
    for (auto n : p)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; n &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
0.4 0.1 0.1 0.4
}}
